timeline.message: handled format string smells missed from previous PR

timeline.bodyText: This is the one I'm unsure about. Not sure whether I actually fixed this properly. codelength threw me out
timeline.author: antares1470

replies.bodyText: I'd agree. It looks like the wrong number of args.
replies.author: arcturus2

timeline.bodyText: Hopefully this one is alright. I don't think it's the cleanest solution but I'm struggling to come up with a better one right now
timeline.author: antares1470

replies.bodyText:
This was what I was thinking. Let me know if I've missed the mark:
System.out.printf("to %d modules with codelength %s.%df%n", getNumTopModules(), "%", config.getVerboseNumberPrecision());
replies.author: arcturus2

replies.bodyText: The issue is that it leaves out the codelength variable. %s.%df is only used to get the correct formatter for codelength and therefore I believe there needs to an additional step to apply codelength to the given format
replies.author: antares1470
